entry.title: we can all relax now
entry.summary: The context is a discussion about building a simulation of the Bitcoin network for educational purposes. The author questions the level of accuracy required and whether or not they need to simulate the actual contents of messages, including validation. They suggest developing experiments to clarify what is needed such as testing Peter Todd's miner strategy, various network split conditions, double spends and other scenarios. Jeff Garzik offers to contribute 1 BTC to this project.
